statements: UPDATE musical_scales SET scale_name = 'Major', scale_type = 'Diatonic', tonic_note = 'C', interval_structure = 'W W H W W W H' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE musical_scales SET scale_type = 'Pentatonic', interval_structure = 'W W H W W' , scale_name = 'Minor Pentatonic' , tonic_note = 'E' WHERE scale_id = 2;
UPDATE musical_scales SET scale_name = 'Major', scale_type = 'Heptatonic', tonic_note = 'C', interval_structure = 'Whole Whole Half Whole Whole Whole Half' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE musical_scales SET interval_structure = 'Whole Half Whole Whole Whole Whole Half Whole' , scale_name = 'Melodic Minor', tonic_note = 'A' , scale_type = 'Heptatonic' WHERE scale_id = 2;
UPDATE MusicalScales SET scale_notes='C,D,E,F,G,A,B' WHERE scale_id=1
UPDATE ScaleRelationships SET relationship_type='Subordinate' WHERE parent_scale_id=2 AND child_scale_id=4
UPDATE MusicalScales SET scale_name = 'Major Scale', scale_notes = 'C, D, E, F, G, A, B' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE ScaleRelationships SET parent_scale_id = 2, relationship_type = 'Relative' WHERE relationship_id = 5;
UPDATE musical_scales SET scale_name='Major Scale', scale_notes='Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Ti Do' WHERE scale_id=1;
UPDATE scale_relationships SET relationship_type='Relative Minor' WHERE scale1_id=1 AND scale2_id=6;
UPDATE musical_scales SET scale_name = 'Major Scale', scale_notes = 'C-D-E-F-G-A-B' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE scale_relationships SET relationship_type = 'Relative' WHERE relationship_id = 2;
UPDATE traditional_scales SET scale_name = 'Major Scale' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE modern_scales SET mode_type = 'Dorian' WHERE scale_id = 2;
UPDATE traditional_scales SET note_sequence = 'C,D,E,F,G,A,B' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE modern_scales SET mode_type = 'Ionian' WHERE scale_name = 'Major Pentatonic';
UPDATE traditional_scales SET scale_name = 'Major Scale' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE modern_scales SET scale_type = 'Diatonic' WHERE scale_id = 2;
UPDATE traditional_scales SET scale_name = 'Major Scale' WHERE scale_id = 1;
UPDATE modern_scales SET scale_type = 'Major' WHERE scale_id = 1;
